name: Michael Shawn Phillips
text: I recommend it to friends n colleagues. I would like to see better promos for online use and more coupon codes

name: Daniel Mills
text: Guy working the counter when I showed up to pick up my Pizza was rude and never made eye contact with my.  Only spoke very few words.  Pizza was good but service was not.

name: Mack McGhee, Jr.
text: Arrived when order should have been ready. Waited additional 32 minutes. Worker said he found our order in a warming oven with no ticket. No compensation or apology.

name: Buck Hondo
text: Their contact-less delivery has been dialed in since the beginning, especially when used alongside the Pizza Hut phone app.  Order is tracked to your door and the driver will text you when the process is completed.  The order has always ‚Ä¶More

text: Fresh Pizza and always delicious. Thank you for excellent service

name: Kevin Parchman
text: The food temperature was lukewarm and not hot enough for me. I would suggest making sure that food is as fresh as possible.

name: Edward Hunter
text: Pizza was fine. I was a little disappointed as I order deep dish and got hand tossed as well as ordered my crust with garlic butter and the crust was plain.

name: Elizabeth Phillips
text: They have the best thin crust pizza period. Out of all the pizza places, pizza hut never fails me. I haven't ever had a bad or not that great pizza ever from pizza hut

text: The pizza was very dry the tops taste like old killed pig the pineapple had no taste to it pizza was not cut in slices an was cold it's so sad

name: robert miles
text: This store was the best pizza place in the Triad. But, for the last two months they have become the worst. In flavor, about of toppings, in the way they cut the pie, getting the orders wrong and delivering them cold.

text: In my order I requested no green peppers my pizza had green peppers.

text: I love the personal pan pizza the best!!!!

name: melissa bivens
text: Great pizza

name: k. murphy
text: This Pizza Hut is great! Always friendly, always fast, great delivery time, and the food is always hot and correct. And this is saying a lot considering I used to work for a Pizza Hut in Maryland.

name: Kumakai
text: After fighting with the app for 30 min trying to get it to accept my phone number i give up and call them.  After making me hold for 30 more min they answer and before I'm even able to male an order the guy on the phone was very rude ‚Ä¶More

text: Good pizza, great staff. I forgot my wallet and a driver ran me down to give it back. You guys are Awesome!
